snippet: The former space of Japonais and then Kibo is becoming a sports bar; add Boomer Esiason’s name to the Stadium Grill.
abstract: Restaurants Ainsworth Park, Boomer Esiason's Stadium Grill, El Mitote, Flatiron Room, The Leadbelly, Niu Noodle House, Ryu Snack Window, and Urbanspace Meatpacking open in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The former space of Japonais and then Kibo is becoming a sports bar; add Boomer Esiason’s name to the Stadium Grill.

headline.seo: Sports Bars Open in Gramercy and Midtown
